messages.subject: 2 things...replies and a quote..?
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, all! First - THANK you for the replies I have gotten about Laura. I feel HEARD and I needed that. It s been 1 month today since I ve seen her, and the
messages.messageBody:
Hi, all!


First - THANK you for the replies I have gotten about Laura. I feel HEARD
and I needed that. It's been 1 month today since I've seen her, and the
responses I got are helping me keep it together and respond to her as I can. So
again, a true, deep, heartfelt thanks to all of you - even those that did not
reply about my subject specifically, because I get SO much from each issue, each
conversation.

And...there was an AMAZING quote one of you had in a letter to me and I also
saw in someone's sigg. I think...about basically taking the responsibility
for being who we are...? Could someone kindly send me that again? I *need* it!

I have more questions, but right now, I am absorbing my replies and thinking
and feeling. I have some stuff happening with Grace and her schooled friends
(so that last post about the girls and the camp scenario was SOOOOO timely!)
but I'll get to that as I can.

Thanks again, all.
Karen

http://discover.aol.com/memed/aolcom30tour
